name: Hydrophobia Prophecy
summary: Yet another Hydrophobia re-release. Hydrophobia Prophecy is a Steam and PSN “comprehensive reinvention” release of the original Xbox Live Arcade game. As such, Prophecy features new levels, new puzzles, a re-tooled narrative, and even several technical enhancements like better lighting, textures, and animations.
info:
• 中文名: 恐水症：预言
  • 平台: PC
